Compute PCA for the projection bases

Source: R/explore_space.R
compute_pca.Rd

Compute PCA for the projection bases

compute_pca(dt, group = NULL, random = TRUE)

Arguments

dt

A data object from the running the optimisation algorithm in guided tour
group

The grouping variable, useful when there are multiple algorithms in the data object
random

Boolean, if the random data from the high dimensional sphere should be bounded

Examples

dplyr::bind_rows(holes_1d_geo, holes_1d_better) %>% compute_pca(group = method)
#> $pca_summary
